title: Please Start Your Show - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Business Management   Businessmen   Celebrities   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Gamers   Leadership   Manipulative Characters   Multiple Identities   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Possessive Characters   Sickly Characters   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator
author: Wu Shi   雾十
description:
Lu Jianyan is absolutely certain that the world he lives in has become crazy.

The romantic friend suddenly announced that he would love him to death; the stranger suddenly decided to die for him … It seemed that the whole world wanted to fall in love with him overnight.

Lu Jianyan: What? [Dazed.jpg]

World: Friend, have you heard of fast reincarnation with the system? There are always a few people who firmly believe that attacking you is the best shortcut to complete the task.

Lu Jianyan: Simpler, begging for a simpler way to complete the task.>
